citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:28pm on June 5,
2023. Upon arrival at the inspection site's listed address, the inspector knocked on the door and there was no answer.
The inspector then called the phone number associated with the account. The registrant answered the phone but reported
he was out of state and could not be available for inspection with one hour. The inspector then left the site.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:28pm on June 5, 
2023. Upon arrival at the inspection site's listed address, the inspector knocked on the door and there was no answer. 
The inspector then called the phone number associated with the account. The registrant answered the phone but reported 
he was out of state and could not be available for inspection with one hour. The inspector then left the site. 
 
 
 
End Section
